EmailTemplate.description: Used by Order RT in case. Case closed and related contact survey sent date more than 30 days then we are sending Emil to user.
EmailTemplate.name: NSS 30 Days Case Closure Order RT- Workflow
EmailTemplate.subject: Survey Feedback for {!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
We value your feedback. Please take a moment to complete a short survey by clicking the link below.
Provide Feedback
Thank you in advance for your participation.
Sincerely,
Customer Support Honeywell Aerospace
